website_summaries.verdict: Powerful, versatile, and flexible locking option to prevent theft.
pros: Steel cables are covered in a PVC coating that is designed to keep bike paint protected
Code is set by individual customers
Flexible cable that is easy to store and transport
Long enough to cover both tires and confuse thieves
cons: The security level is lower than the other items on our list

customer_reviews.title: Excellent thick cable, but it’s still just a cable.
customer_reviews.text: I rated this cable lock 5 stars, but let’s remember this is just a cable. I’m using it in conjunction with an Abus 540 U-Lock, to secure the front wheel and in case I need to secure the bike to something larger than the U-Lock will fit. It’s over 7 feet long so it will wrap around both your wheels and the frame and a thick streetlight. This is a thick cable and it will not fit through the seat rails so it can’t secure your seat. It’s flexible enough to wind it into a tight circle and it’s got a thick clear coating on it so it won’t scratch the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Will not protect any bike that costs over $50 USD
customer_reviews.text: This is a toy. Do not buy. Anyone with a pair of good scissors and 5 minutes of spare time can have a go at this.
customer_reviews.author: XBMC Dude

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Thick vinyl on cable, loops, and crimp fittings. Should reduce scratching. We will see if the vinyl has good adhesion for the long haul, but for now, appears good. I does take up room on the bike even when rolled up. It is flexible but not like spaghetti, the trade-off is to increase the time the thief may need to cut the cable. Remember the 10% rule in protecting your bike, Ride Safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very long and deters thieves
customer_reviews.text: This cable is longer than I thought it would be. It gives me ample room to cover both tries and pass it through the seat. So it secures the essentials of the bike. I use it with an Abus U-Lock and it's kept my road bike from being stolen in all sorts of neighborhoods in New York City.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cid

customer_reviews.title: Confident Security
customer_reviews.text: The cable is quite strong and long enough to adequately secure my bike with confidence that the bike will be there when I return.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Kacprzak

customer_reviews.title: Secure 10mm cable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coated 10mm secure cable in addition to my ABUS Bordo Granit X Plus 6500 and Granit XPlus 540
customer_reviews.author: Baasankhuu B.

customer_reviews.title: must to secure bike
customer_reviews.text: to secure wheel and seat without this if you have a quick disconnect seat post good by post and seat same goes for your wheel that you did not put this through.
customer_reviews.author: John finn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cable works well with my ABUS U Lock-I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: wingmam

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 bikes, a bit overkill for one bike
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cable 3 weeks ago and have been using it nearly everyday since. It is a great item, the cable feels resistant and is relatively easy to fold. The cable has a velcro attachment to keep it folded. I never use it because I fold it and stick it in my backpack. The cable is very long and therefore it is easy to lock every item of the bicycle. I didn't manage to make it go through the attachment of my saddle as the cable is too thick.
customer_reviews.author: badzil

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: What else can be said? It is a simple cable. Works. I use it combined with a Abus Granit x-plus u-bolt lock.
customer_reviews.author: seabumb

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cable
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice and thick for a cable, this combined with my abus lock calms me knowing that other people just have very thin cables parked next to mine ;)
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: nice flexible cable
customer_reviews.text: Especially for its size, this cable is very flexible, making it very easy to wrap around your bike or store in a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: charles mitchell

customer_reviews.title: good length good weight
customer_reviews.text: good length good weight. with the Abus mini 140 u-lock I can lock up without worry most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets.
customer_reviews.text: As solid as a cable can get. Along with a good U lock, the chances of getting ripped off are slim indeed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like Abus locks so much and this one didn't betray my expectation as well. Quality and delivery is very good.
customer_reviews.author: HyungKeun Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Good extra protection
customer_reviews.text: Great secondary protection for tires etc on your bike. Its solid but not so solid that a good sturdy lock isn't also required. I would not use just this and a padlock. Overall not bad
customer_reviews.author: tmybrgr

customer_reviews.title: I give it five stars on the assumption that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I give it five stars on the assumption that it really will defeat wire cutters (though not cable cutters.) If the assumption proves to be greatly exaggerated, the rating gets demoted to zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hall

customer_reviews.title: This is the best cable for a cable lock sold by anyone anywhere , quality of it is unmatched.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cable for a cable lock sold by anyone anywhere , quality of it is unmatched anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D -- Braintree, Mass.

product_meta.title: Abus Locks Cobra Cable Lock (10mm x 220 loop cable)
product_meta.description: The Spun Steel Abus Cobra Cable 10mm/220cm is a strong, high quality and a very flexible coil cable. The double Lasso ends allow one end to be threaded through the other, opening the total length of the cable to be used for greater versatility. The Cobra Cable is ideal for use in conjunction with a D-Lock, for attaching many bikes together or for adding additional security to an Abus high security U-Lock. The Abus Cobra Cable is recommended for securing entry level bicycles and children’s bicycles.
feature_bullets: 10mm high quality steel cable with two loop ends
Compact and highly flexible design allows for easy transport

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
